languages.text: "Несомненно — сразу же, как только ситуация на планете будет стабилизирована. Помимо наших владений значительно пострадал и размещенный на Даргонусе корпус Адептус Администратум — надеюсь, это не приведет к каким-либо обвинениям в адрес фон Валанциус..."

"Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilises. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — I hope this won't lead to any kind of accusations against House von Valancius..."
languages.original_text: "Несомненно — сразу же, как только ситуация на планете будет стабилизирована. Помимо наших владений значительно пострадал и размещенный на Даргонусе корпус Адептус Администратум — надеюсь, это не приведет к каким-либо обвинениям в адрес фон Валанциус..."

traits.locale_text: "Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilizes. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — here's hoping this won't lead to any accusations against the von Valancius name..."

"Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilizes. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — here's hoping this won't lead to any accusations against the von Valancius name..."

"Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilises. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — I hope this won't lead to any kind of accusations against House von Valancius..."

"Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilises. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — I hope this won't lead to any kind of accusations against House von Valancius..."

"Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilises. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — I hope this won't lead to any kind of accusations against House von Valancius..."

languages.text: 「この惑星の状況が安定し次第、すぐにでも報告させていただきます。我々の領地に加えて、ダルゴナスに駐在していた帝国行政局にも深刻な被害が及びました―この影響でフォン・ヴァランシウス家が追及されなければ良いのですが…」
languages.original_text: "Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilises. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — I hope this won't lead to any kind of accusations against House von Valancius..."

traits.locale_text: 「この惑星の状況が安定し次第、すぐにでも報告させていただきます。我々の領地に加えて、ダルゴナスに駐在していた帝国行政局にも深刻な被害が及びました―この影響でフォン・ヴァランシウス家が追及されなければ良いのですが…」

languages.text: “我责无旁贷，只等行星的局势稳定下来。除了我们自己的领地之外，驻扎在达戈努斯的帝国内政部也遭到了严重的破坏。我希望，这不会导致冯·瓦兰修斯家族遭到指控……”
languages.original_text: "Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilises. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — I hope this won't lead to any kind of accusations against House von Valancius..."

traits.locale_text: “我责无旁贷，只等行星的局势稳定下来。除了我们自己的领地之外，驻扎在达戈努斯的帝国内政部也遭到了严重的破坏。我希望，这不会导致冯·瓦兰修斯家族遭到指控……”

languages.text: «Naturalmente, en cuanto la situación del planeta se estabilice. Además de a nuestros territorios han causado graves daños al departamento del Adeptus Administratum que hay en Dargonus. Espero que esto no provoque acusaciones contra la casa von Valancius...».
languages.original_text: "Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilises. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — I hope this won't lead to any kind of accusations against House von Valancius..."

traits.locale_text: «Naturalmente, en cuanto la situación del planeta se estabilice. Además de a nuestros territorios han causado graves daños al departamento del Adeptus Administratum que hay en Dargonus. Espero que esto no provoque acusaciones contra la casa von Valancius...».

languages.text: « Bien entendu, ce sera fait dès que la situation se sera stabilisée. Il n'y a pas que nos territoires qui ont été touchés : la division de l'Adeptus Administratum, stationnée à Dargonus, a également été prise pour cible. J'espère que cela n'entraînera pas d'accusations à l'encontre de la maison von Valancius... »
languages.original_text: "Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilises. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — I hope this won't lead to any kind of accusations against House von Valancius..."

traits.locale_text: « Bien entendu, ce sera fait dès que la situation se sera stabilisée. Il n'y a pas que nos territoires qui ont été touchés : la division de l'Adeptus Administratum, stationnée à Dargonus, a également été prise pour cible. J'espère que cela n'entraînera pas d'accusations à l'encontre de la maison von Valancius... »

languages.text: "Natürlich – sobald die Lage auf dem Planeten sich stabilisiert hat. Nicht nur unsere eigenen Territorien wurden schwer beschädigt, es hat auch die Abteilung des Adeptus Administratum auf Dargonus getroffen – hoffentlich zieht das keine Anklagen gegen das Haus von Valancius nach sich ..."
languages.original_text: "Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilises. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — I hope this won't lead to any kind of accusations against House von Valancius..."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich – sobald die Lage auf dem Planeten sich stabilisiert hat. Nicht nur unsere eigenen Territorien wurden schwer beschädigt, es hat auch die Abteilung des Adeptus Administratum auf Dargonus getroffen – hoffentlich zieht das keine Anklagen gegen das Haus von Valancius nach sich ..."

languages.text: "Şüphesiz. Gezegende durumlar düzelir düzelmez emriniz yerine getirilecektir. Kendi topraklarımıza ek olarak Dargonus'ta yer alan Adeptus Administratum departmanı da büyük hasar gördü. Umarım bu durum von Valancius Hanesi'ne karşı suçlamalara yol açmaz..."
languages.original_text: "Indubitably — as soon as the situation on the planet stabilises. In addition to our own territories, serious damage was done to the Adeptus Administratum department stationed on Dargonus — I hope this won't lead to any kind of accusations against House von Valancius..."

traits.locale_text: "Şüphesiz, gezegendeki durum istikrara kavuşur kavuşmaz emriniz yerine getirilecektir. Kendi topraklarımıza ek olarak Dargonus’ta yer alan Adeptus Administratum departmanı da büyük hasar gördü. Umarım bu durum von Valancius Hanesi’ne karşı suçlamalara yol açmaz..."
